name: Paintball 707
description: Paintball 707 is a first person shooter sports game for single- and multiplayer games. Target is to mark the players of the opposite team and capture flags. The game is constantly evolving.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32 Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2,8 GHZ Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics 512 MB VRAM (medium-class) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: required Additional Notes: Upgrading to a 64 Bit OS is strongly recommended!
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 Bit Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3,4 GHz Quad Core or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics 2048 VRAM (medium- or upper-class) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: required

reviews.review_text: This is the mehest game of all time (Exept maybe E.T., but thats fir another time.). The gameplay is a little rocky at times the varity of wepons is pretty scarce. The A.I. is not that smart. Also It takes one hit to kil an A.I..... WHAT!!!! The sound of stepping is annoying. Also the commuinty dyed tis month, December of 2016, so you'll have to play agianst bots.The game can get laggy at times as well. I would recommend getting this game on a sale or as a gift.    -1/10-Gabe Bewell 0/10-IGN 5/10-Me, Misterliver. I'M YOUR HOST KILLER KEEMSTAR LETS GET RIIIIGGGGGHHHHTTTT IN TO THE NEWS!!!!!!
